      • vehicleChosen

        public java.lang.String vehicleChosen(int choose)
        This method is a sub menu for select the type of car between Gasoline, electric or hybrid car to add to company. pre:Company already created.
        Parameters:
        choose - option to type of vehicle to add
        Returns:
        info to report the state of the process. post:A selection was done and then can continue to the process of add a car.

      • carChosen

        public java.lang.String carChosen(int selection)
        This method notify about the car was added without problems. pre:A car was created.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        info as String of the notification. post:The new car now is visible on the list.

        This method select the type of vehicle to add between Car o Motorcycle. pre:The company was created.
        Returns:
        info as String of the notification of process. post:Continues on the process to add a vehicle.

      • showClients

        public void showClients()
        This method deploy a list of the employees with their clients assigned, employees without clients assigned will not be visibles. pre:A client must be added as minimum.
        post:A list with the employee and his assigned clients are deployed.

      • showClientsComplete

        public void showClientsComplete()
        This method deploy a list of the employees with their clients assigned and their complete information, employees without clients assigned will not be visibles. pre:A client must be added as minimum.
        post:A list with the employee and his assigned clients are deployed with complete information.

        sellerNumber - Integer of position on sales Man array
